TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Don_Adams, title = Don_Adams, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Don_Adams} }

S.FORM: Don Adams‎ nalecuh i Royal Oak, Michigan, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput. Don Adams‎ i 1970 a mihcaan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 8 ku uwac atu silsil 120, namapili' tu nu San Diego Rockets putiput. nalecuhan ciniza i 11 a bulad 27 a demiad, 1947 a mihcaan. Don Adams, u kawaw niza sa, u miunduay. mapatay tuway ciniza i 2013 a mihcaan, u uzip niza sa, enem a bataan izaw ku enem ku mihcaan.

Don Adams‎ nalecoh i Royal Oak, Michigan, nano syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot. Don Adams‎ i 1970 a mihcaan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 8 ko owac ato silsil 120, namapili' to no San Diego Rockets potipot. nalecohan ciniza i 11 a bolad 27 a demiad, 1947 a mihcaan. Don Adams, o kawaw niza sa, o miondoay. mapatay toway ciniza i 2013 a mihcaan, o ozip niza sa, enem a bataan izaw ko enem ko mihcaan.
